name: Placide
description: AfterHaitiwas decimated by natural disasters, Placide, along with many other Haitians, moved intoPacifica, a run-down district ofNight City. Placide became the second-in-command of theVoodoo BoysunderMaman Brigitte. He radiated the aura of danger and threat â€“ inspiring fear and respect in those around him. Placide cared little for the outsiders who came into Pacifica and would only help those in the Haitian community. Like most of the Voodoo Boys, he was a dedicated netrunner who was determined to uncover the secrets of theOld Net. In 2077,NetWatchhad taskedan agentto map out the Voodoo Boys...
